text: @PressSec It's TRUMP’S fault. Trump called COVID-19 a hoax, told people to go to Capitols to LIBERATE states, if trump hadn't REFUSED TO WEAR A MASK, if trump hadn't decided HIS EGO IS MORE IMPORTANT THAN PEOPLE'S LIVES, if trump hadn't LIED, Cain & 150,000 people would STILL BE ALIVE.
